4: <mistake>pa</mistake> mi 'gyur steng 'og <mistake>tu// phan</mistake> tshun thabs dang shes rab po // dkyil 'khor bcu po yang dag <mistake>sbyor // sar</mistake> mo rnams ni phan tshun <mistake>du//mgo</mistake> bor lag mthil sbyar ba <mistake>la//gri</mistake> gug dang bcas rtse
